page.title: 14TOURISM.
page.content: Tourism in our area is really restricted to day-trippers,ramblers, cyclists and people who want to see Stonyhurst. Day-trippers get good pub lunches, the ramblers explore the 'Ribble Way', and golfers play on the Stonyhurst course.Fishermen use the R.Hodder and R.Ribble.Historians and scholars come to use the libraries at Stonyhurst, which also accommodates visiting rugby teams.Visitors to Hurst Green will enjoy the attractive gardens,and hopefully patronise the cafe at the Hurst Green Post Office (just outside our area) and the Whitehall tea-rooms. Visitors may also see the annual Veteran Car Rally.Mitton church is open Sunday afternoons.
